titles.title: Antitrust Freedom Act of 2020
Antitrust Freedom Act of 2020
A bill to permit voluntary economic activity.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Antitrust Freedom Act of 2020
This bill establishes that certain laws related to antitrust and unfair competition shall not prohibit or otherwise apply to any voluntary economic coordination, cooperation, or agreement between any individual or group of individuals.
